title: (University Members) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 40 of 2024), hereby order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Seanad Electoral (University Members)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Seanad Electoral (University Members) 

(Amendment) Act 2024 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited seanad electoral (university members) (amendment) act 2024 (commencement) (no 2) order 2025

title: (University Members) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 40 of 2024), hereby order
heading: 2. The Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Act 2024
text_raw:
2. The Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Act 2024 
(No. 40 of 2024), in so far as it is not already in operation, shall come into 
operation on the date of the dissolution of Dáil Éireann that next occurs after the 
making of this Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 May, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [213] 3

title: (University Members) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 40 of 2024), hereby order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 2(1) of the Seanad Electoral (University 
Members) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 40 of 2024), this Order appoints the date 
of the dissolution of Dáil Éireann that next occurs after the making of this Order 
as the day on which the Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) 
Act 2024 (No. 40 of 2024), in so far as it is not already in operation, shall come 
into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [213]
